resources.string: If you are planning to lose weight or have an ideal body shape, The easiest way you can do is to regularly do workout movements.

Workout can help the body burn calories and fat in a relatively short time. Not only that, workout is also another way if you don't like strenuous exercise. or just planning to start exercising regularly
Push ups are a type of strength exercise that works to train the biceps and triceps.
Pull ups are a form of strength training that aims to maintain and increase muscle mass. This exercise is beneficial for shaping the body, especially the muscles of the arms and upper body.

Sit ups are an exercise that has a variety of benefits, especially for toning the abdominal muscles so that they look flat. In addition to the abdominal muscles, this type of exercise can also help train the chest muscles
Planking is one of the most effective simple exercises for the body. Just by doing plank movements for 60 seconds every day, the muscles of the body will become strong and you will feel the benefits.
Cobra Pose is a powerful movement to improve posture, very effective in strengthening the spinal erector and muscles in other areas of the lower back.
The Overhead Extension, also known as the dumbbell tricep extension, is an isolation exercise that targets your triceps muscles.
Chin up is a weight training exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles in the upper back, also the biceps muscles in the arm.
Whey supplements usually contain high protein and help build trained muscles.
